sourcesContent: import { Button, Modal, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, ModalContent, ModalFooter, ModalHeader, ModalOverlay, useDisclosure } from '@chakra-ui/react' import React, { useState } from 'react' const GroupChatModal = ({children}) => { const {isOpen, onOpen, onClose} = useDisclosure(); useState(); return ( <> {children} Modal Title ); } export default GroupChatModal
